name: Awesome Swordsman
effects: Enable unit to equip two one-handed weapons
Increase ATK by 15% when equipped with a Katana
Increase ATK by 15% when equipped with a Sword
Increase ATK by 15% when equipped with a Dagger
Increase ATK by 15% when equipped with a Great Sword

desc_short: Boost ATK when equipped with a sword, short sword, or large sword
提高裝備劍短劍大劍時攻擊的數值
검, 단검, 대검 장착 시 공격력 상승
Aug. l'ATT lorsque une épée normale, longue ou courte est équipée
Erhöht ANG, wenn ein Schwert, Kurzschwert oder Langschwert ausgerüstet ist.
Aumenta ATQ al llevar una espada, espada corta o espada larga

提高裝備劍短劍大劍時攻擊的數值。
